form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Application for Adjustment of Status and Naturalization, I-4129

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/18/2023 Block 1. - Information About Alien Beneficiary (Continued) 21. No.) (Number and street) (Town or city) (Province or State) (Zip Code, If in U.S.) 870, ELMIRA DRIVE SUNNYVALE CA 94087 23. Name and address of present employer e. Date alien began this employment Not applicable Not applicable 24. Check the appropriate box below and furnish the information required for the box checked: Aon Aont abomeo Beneficiary will apply for a visa abroad at the American Consulate in (City in foreign country) (Foreign country) Beneficiary is in the United States and will apply for adjustment of status to that of a lawful permanent resident in the Office of the Immigration and Naturalization Service at SAN FRANCISCO CALIFORNIA (City) (State) If the application for adjustment of status is denied, the beneficiary will apply for a visa abroad at the American Counsulate in NEW DELHI INDIA (City in foreign country) (Foreign Country) Block II. - Information About Petitioner 25. My name is (Last) (First) (Middle) 26. If you are a married woman, give your maiden name ADVANI GULU TECKCHAND 27. I reside in the United States at (Apt. No.) (Number and street) (Town or city) (State) (ZIP Code) 870, ELMIRA Drive, SUNNYVALE CA 94087 28. Address abroad (if any) (Number and street) (City or town) (Province) (Country) 29. I was born: (Month) (Day) (Year) In: (City or town) (State or Province) (Country) 22nd 1936 HYDERABAD (SIND) Now PAKISTAN 30. If you are a citizen of the United States, give the following: a. Citizenship was acquired Check one) through birth in the U. through parents through naturalization through marriaga (1) If acquired through naturalization, give name under which naturalized, number of naturalization certificate and date and place of naturalization: GULU TECKCHAND ADVAN 28 Sept. 1971 Naturalization No - 9574470 NO SAN BECOBD FRANCISCO (2) If acquired through parentage or marriage, have you obtained a certificate of citizenship in your own name based on such acquisition? (a) If so, give number of certificate and date and place of issuance: (b) If not, submit evidence of citizenship in accordance with Instruction 3a.(2). b. Have you or any person through whom you claim citizenship ever lost United States citizenship? No If so, attach detailed explanation on separate sheet. 31. If you are a lawful permanent resident alien of the United States, give the following: a. Alien Registration Number: b. Date, place, and means of admission for lawful permanent residence A Not applidable c. Have you ever lost status as a lawful permanent resident alien? No If so, explain: (If you are married to a citizen of the United States, read instruction 1b carefully) Block III. - Oath or Affirmation of Petitioner , swear- (affirm) that I know the contents of this petition signed by me and that the statements Signature of petitioner (See Instruction No. 5) Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before me this 25 day of SEPT A.D CARO!
